item.title: VMware ESX servers unable to manage via VIC, SSH or iLO session
item.description: Today i had a nasty problem with a VMware environment. Some VMware ESX servers were disconnected from vCenter. Tried to connect the VMware ESX hosts using the VIC,Â but that was not possible. I was unable to login via SSH connection, connect with HP iLO to the HP Blade enclosure and did a remote connection to the console.
